description: I CAN DO - Simple HTML page for portfolio, personal content or catalog. the content is set using a json file, which is analyzed using javascript and displays the content in several ways (gallery, list, text). There is a built-in image viewer, HTML content and links to external pages. the number of pages and directories is not limited
